## Milestone 2
**This file contains the raw data of fatal police shootings in the USA**

*A list of variables included for each case that may be relevant for my exploration:*

1. Id
2. Name
3. Date
4. Manner of Death
5. Armed
6. Age
7. Gender
8. Race
9. City
10. State
11. Signs of Mental Illness
12. Threat level
13. Flee(ing)
14. Body camera
